name: Making Marks
description:
A short puzzle game made in two days for the The 2022 GMTK Game Jam, with theme “Roll of the dice”.

My interpretation of the theme was an industrial die - a tool used to cut or form a specific shape. You must create all the imprints, but the dies can only roll in one direction! 

Controls:

  • Arrow keys / wasd for movement
  • R: Restart
  • Z: Undo
  • M: Mute Music
  • J/K: skip to previous/next level

Credits:

  • Based on Grid Game Groundwork for Unity by Corey Martin.
  • Roller 3D model by Wrighter (@wrightwrighter).
  • "Industrious Ferret" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
  • Sound Effects from freesound.org.
  • Floral patterns by William Morris, public domain from rawpixel.com
  • Tree models from https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/lowpoly-forest-pack
